
# Raw Data

* Intraday data for the *S&P/BMV IPC Equity Index*. 

.panelset[

.panel[.panel-name[Dimensions]

* 2M+ observations (`n = 2,133,890`) and `k = 23` variables. 

```{r}
IPC %>% dim()
```

]

.panel[.panel-name[Time series]

* Time series composed of prices and trades per minute. 

* The data begins in 1996 and goes all the way through the first half of 2018.

```{r panel-chunk2}
IPC %>% select(2) %>% slice(1,nrow(IPC)) %>% pull()
```
]

.panel[.panel-name[Variables]

```{r panel-chunk}
IPC %>% names()
```

]

]
